long_description: deha tech is a global engineering and contracting group company offering experience and genius solutions. as deha tech we offer services in the fields of design & engineering, procurement & logistic, fabrication, construction and commissioning for various industries. deha tech is committed to playing a positive role in the broader community, promoting human values and social integration, as well as following environmentally responsible practices in all of its business operations. in addition to the performance record in successful project implementation, deha tech pursues its development strategy and aims at expanding its business activities into new regional markets with growing population needs. deha tech is constantly improving its know-how, rich human resources and capacity. making use of its values and capabilities today, deha tech has turned into a leading international epc contractor. our mission provides innovative solutions for industrial projects. new epc project has started in uzbekistan â€“ navoiy; we're proud of our safety, integrity, teamwork and excellence commitment.
